languages.text: {n}"Я в каждом человеке, и меня боятся потерять, ибо без меня приходит конец. Но отдай меня Императору, и будешь вечен."{/n}
{n}"I am within every human, and my loss is feared, for without me comes the end. But give me to the Emperor, and you will be eternal."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"Я в каждом человеке, и меня боятся потерять, ибо без меня приходит конец. Но отдай меня Императору, и будешь вечен."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}"I am within every human, and my loss is feared for without me, the end comes. But give me to the Emperor, and you will be eternal."{/n}
{n}"I am within every human, and my loss is feared for without me, the end comes. But give me to the Emperor, and you will be eternal."{/n}

languages.text: {n}« Je réside en chaque humain et on craint de me perdre, car sans moi vient la fin, mais qui me donne à l'Empereur sera éternel. »{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"I am within every human, and my loss is feared, for without me comes the end. But give me to the Emperor, and you will be eternal."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}« Je réside en chaque humain et on craint de me perdre, car sans moi vient la fin, mais qui me donne à l'Empereur sera éternel. »{/n}

languages.text: {n}«Resido en el interior de cada ser humano, y todos temen perderme, pues sin mí sobreviene el fin. Mas entrégame al Emperador y vivirás eternamente».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"I am within every human, and my loss is feared, for without me comes the end. But give me to the Emperor, and you will be eternal."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}«Resido en el interior de cada ser humano, y todos temen perderme, pues sin mí sobreviene el fin. Mas entrégame al Emperador y vivirás eternamente».{/n}

languages.text: {n}“所有人都拥有我。若是失去了我，后果会非常可怕，因为若是我不在，死亡便会接踵而至。不过，若是把我献给帝皇，你就会得到永生。”{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"I am within every human, and my loss is feared, for without me comes the end. But give me to the Emperor, and you will be eternal."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}“所有人都拥有我。若是失去了我，后果会非常可怕，因为若是我不在，死亡便会接踵而至。不过，若是把我献给帝皇，你就会得到永生。”{/n}

languages.text: {n}「私は全人類の中にいる。そして、私がいなくなれば、終わりは来る。しかし、私を皇帝にお渡しになれば、あなたは永遠となるでしょう」{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"I am within every human, and my loss is feared, for without me comes the end. But give me to the Emperor, and you will be eternal."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}「私は全人類の中にいる。そして、私がいなくなれば、終わりは来る。しかし、私を皇帝にお渡しになれば、あなたは永遠となるでしょう」{/n}

languages.text: {n}"Ich liege in jedem Menschen, und mein Verlust wird gefürchtet, denn ohne mich kommt das Ende. Schenkt mich aber dem Imperator und Ihr werdet ewig leben."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"I am within every human, and my loss is feared, for without me comes the end. But give me to the Emperor, and you will be eternal."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}"Ich liege in jedem Menschen, und mein Verlust wird gefürchtet, denn ohne mich kommt das Ende. Schenkt mich aber dem Imperator und Ihr werdet ewig leben."{/n}

languages.text: {n}"Ben tüm insanların içindeyim ve kaybımdan korkulur, çünkü ben olmayınca son gelir. Ama beni İmparator'a adarsan ebedî olursun."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}"I am within every human, and my loss is feared, for without me comes the end. But give me to the Emperor, and you will be eternal."{/n}
